data.meta_description: Stream and watch live TV and your favorite NBC TV shows with the NBC App. Watch everything, including classic hits, and live stream national and local news - anâ¦
data.text:
Stream and watch live TV and your favorite NBC TV shows with the NBC App. Watch everything, including classic hits, and live stream national and local news - anytime, anywhere! Stream series from more networks, including Bravo, E!, Oxygen, SYFY, USA, Telemundo and more! Watch timeless episodes of classic series and hit shows from beginning to end - all in one place.

Watch brand-new shows and all of your favorite classics on the NBC App and stay on track with all of the newest primetime hits. Watch episodes, favorite and save new and classic TV shows and continue watching the latest series across all your devices when you log in with your NBCUniversal Profile.

Stream TV shows for FREE on your iPad or iPhone, and stream episodes of NBC series to your TV with AirPlay or Chromecast.

Live streaming has never been easier. Never miss the live local or national news. Stream shows from more networks instantly, including Bravo, E!, Oxygen, SYFY, USA and more.

WATCH TV FOR FREE with episodes and video clips from:

America's Got Talent

Hot Wheelsâ¢: Ultimate Challenge

American Ninja Warrior

Law & Order: SVU

Law & Order: Organized Crime

That's My Jam

Chicago Med

Chicago P.D.

Chicago Fire

The Blacklist

LIVE STREAM NBC NOW

â¢ Watch TV shows via the NBC Live Stream, now available in most markets nationwide, by linking to your TV service provider.

â¢ Stream live news, local or national.

â¢ Live stream from anywhere.

STREAM TV EPISODES, SPORTS, MOVIES AND CLIPS

â¢ Watch episodes of brand-new NBC series the day after they air.

â¢ Catch the latest in NASCAR, The Open and Premier League.

â¢ Stream classic TV shows you know and love for free.

â¢ Stream movies and TV shows, including hundreds of new episodes, by linking to your TV provider.

â¢ Log in to unlock even more!

STREAM CLASSIC TV SHOWS

â¢ Stream timeless episodes of throwback TV shows for free!

â¢ Watch your favorite throwback TV series, like Emerald City, The Event and more!

WATCH NBC LIVE WITH CLOSED CAPTIONING

â¢ Watch TV shows using closed captioning by tapping the "CC" icon in player controls.

NBCUNIVERSAL PROFILE

â¢ Create an NBCUniversal Profile to favorite, save and continue watching TV shows across all your devices.

â¢ Receive credits to unlock three episodes for FREE!

Please note: Use of the app is limited to the United States and its territories. Video is accessible via 3G, 4G, LTE and Wi-Fi networks. Data charges may apply.

Privacy Policy: https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy?brandA=NBC_Entertainment&intake=NBC_Entertainment

Your Privacy Options: https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/notrtoo?brandA=NBC_Entertainment&intake=NBC_Entertainment

CA Notice: https://www.nbcuniversal.com/privacy/california-consumer-privacy-act?intake=NBC_Entertainment

This app features Nielsen proprietary measurement software, which will allow you to contribute to market research, like Nielsenâs TV Ratings.

To learn more about our digital measurement products and your choices in regard to them, please visit http://www.nielsen.com/digitalprivacy for more information.

Konicaminolta ,

Oh NBC...

I grew up on NBC. I generally love their shows, from Seinfeld to Superstore. That âding-ding-dingâ is a sound I like. However, this app is disappointing. Why? Because I cannot pay to use it or to not be bothered by commercials. I am a millennial, I have come to love that for 3-5$ dollars more a month I donât have to watch commercials. Plus a subscription cost, perhaps you can fund some shows that have been cancelled that have a strong following, like giving us some form of closure on Dracula or Emerald City. By subscribing, to the NBC app, you can offer the news or sports as an added bonus. Alas, I can watch NBC news without any subscription. Which is great on your part NBC but as an app business model itâs not ideal. People like watching Nightly News. Additionally, if you want to stream original programming, just allowing people to subscribe at a cost can help fund aforementioned original programs. I had to login, with my motherâs Cable account in order to use the app. Which is annoying, and should be unnecessary as regular TV is dying in most city areas. I wouldâve paid 5-7$ a month just to watch NBC (WITH commercials ð) and I wouldâve paid because itâs the only place to find some programs I love. Câmon NBC, itâs 2021. You should focus on your streaming platform, I thoroughly enjoy Peacock, why arenât all of your shows on peacock!? I have to use two NBC applications ...
